short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Display JSON objects by transforming them into Syntax editable highlighted HTML to validate, format, and save
short.de: Anzeige von JSON-Objekten durch Umwandlung in in Syntax editierbares, hervorgehobenes HTML
short.es: Mostrar los objetos JSON transformándolos en HTML resaltado y editable por sintaxis para validarlos, formatearlos y guardarlos.
short.fr: Afficher les objets JSON en les transformant en HTML surligné modifiable par la syntaxe
short.it: Visualizzare gli oggetti JSON trasformandoli in HTML evidenziati con sintassi modificabile per convalidarli, formattarli e salvarli
short.ja: JSON オブジェクトを Syntax 編集可能なハイライトされた HTML に変換して表示し、検証、フォーマット、保存を行います。
short.ko: JSON 객체를 구문 편집이 가능한 HTML로 변환하여 검증, 포맷 및 저장
short.nl: JSON-objecten weergeven door ze om te zetten in bewerkbare HTML met syntaxisaccentuering om te valideren, formatteren en opslaan
short.pl: Wyświetlanie obiektów JSON poprzez przekształcenie ich w podświetlany HTML z możliwością edycji składni.
short.pt_BR: Exibir objetos JSON transformando-os em Sintaxe HTML destacado editável para validar, formatar e salvá-los
short.pt_PT: Mostrar objectos JSON transformando-os em HTML sintáctico editável realçado para validar, formatar e guardar
short.ru: Отображение JSON объектов путем преобразования их в редактируемый синтаксисом выделенный HTML
short.zh_CN: 通过将JSON对象转换为Syntax可编辑的高亮HTML来显示JSON对象，以验证、格式化和保存它们。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension monitors JSON pages and converts them into a human-readable object. You can view, edit, search through values and keys. You can even change the format of a key or drag it into a new place. There is no need to do anything after installation. Just open a JSON page and the extension automatically converts the page into the editor mode.

As of version 0.2.0, the extension uses a dark theme if your browser's default theme is dark.

Supported mime types:
   ► application/json
   ► application/x-javascript
   ► application/hal+json
   ► application/vnd.error+json
   ► application/vnd.api+json
   ► text/javascript
   ► text/x-javascript
   ► text/x-json
   ► text/plain

FEATURES
   ► Supports both JSON & JSONP formats
   ► Has light and dark syntax highlighting themes
   ► Supports collapsible trees
   ► Converts text links into clickable URLs
   ► Supports raw, code, and parsed JSON views
   ► Keeps expanded structure when refreshing the JSON page
   ► Copy Object Path
   ► Copy Outer JSON
   ► Copy Inner JSON
   ► Open a new editor to write a new JSON object
   ► Open a new editor from selection text (right-click context menu)
   ► Supports large numbers (BigInt, BigFloat, ...)

--

Change Logs:
0.1.3:
1. It is now possible to beautify local (file://) JSON files.
2. Extension now uses "persistent = false" background page (event page) to have no performance effect when it is not used.
0.1.6:
1. It is now possible to change the view mode to "Tree", "Code", and "Text" modes. The coding mode is useful to edit the raw JSON, and the text mode is useful to copy the raw data. The default view is the tree view which displays the JSON in a formatted and highlighted format.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_C:
This extension monitor JSON pages and convert them into a human-readable object. You can view, edit, search through values and keys. You can even change a format of a key or drag it into a new place. There is no need to do anything after installation. Just open a JSON page and the extension automatically converts the page into the editor mode.

As of version 0.2.0, the extension uses dark theme if your browser's default theme is dark.

For FAQs please visit:
http://add0n.com/json-beautifier.html
For bug reports visit:
https://github.com/belaviyo/json-beautifier

Supported mime types:
1. application/json
2. application/x-javascript
3. application/hal+json
4. application/vnd.error+json
5. text/javascript
6. text/x-javascript
7. text/x-json
8. text/plain

Change Logs:
0.1.3:
1. It is now possible to beautify local (file://) JSON files.
2. Extension now uses "persistent = false" background page (event page) to have no performance effect when it is not used.
0.1.6:
1. It is now possible to change change the view mode to "Tree", "Code", and "Text" modes. The code mode is useful to edit the raw JSON, and the text mode is useful to copy the raw data. The default view is the tree view which displays the JSON in a formatted and highlighted format.
